item.title: The Multimodal Encoding Strategy
item.description: Core Principle Engage multiple senses and learning channels simultaneously. Your brain creates redundant storage pathways, dramatically improving recall. Why It Works Multiple encoding pathways create redundant memory storage. When one pathway is blocked, others compensate. The more senses involved, the stronger the memory.
